skill.s1.name: Wrathful Thunder
skill.s1.description: Deal [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] to random foes equal to [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color] (4 hits), and inflict [color=#fcff37][b][i]Shock[/i][/b][/color] on main target.
Prioritizes targeting different foes, and repeated hits on same foe deal [color=#fcff37][b]10%[/b][/color] decreased damage.
skill.s2.name: Blitz Mine
skill.s2.description: Deal [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] to 1 foe equal to [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of Attack[/b][/color].
Increase party's [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.s3.name: Electroshark
skill.s3.description: Deal [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] to all foes equal to [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color].

If a foe is [color=#fcff37][b][i]Shocked[/i][/b][/color], activate a [color=#fcff37][b]Technical[/b][/color] and deal bonus [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] equal to [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color].
skill.hl.name: Highlight
skill.hl.description: Deal [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] to all foes equal to [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color], inflict [color=#fcff37][b][i]Shock[/i][/b][/color] on the main target, and increase [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] taken for 2 turns.
skill.p1.name: Extra Inning
skill.p1.description: When foes are [color=#fcff37][b][i]Shocked[/i][/b][/color], [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] chance to extend effect duration by 1 turn.
skill.p2.name: Line Drive to Pitcher
skill.p2.description: Increase [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] taken by main target of a skill by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.
awareness.a0.name: Strike Zone
awareness.a0.description: When Motoha deals [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color], [color=#fcff37][b]15%[/b][/color] chance to inflict [color=#fcff37][b][i]Shock[/i][/b][/color] on the target.
Also, when dealing damage to [color=#fcff37][b][i]Shocked[/i][/b][/color] foes, increase [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]30%[/b][/color].
awareness.a1.name: Shocking Double Play
awareness.a1.description: When dealing repeated hits on the same foe, decrease damage by [color=#fcff37][b]15%[/b][/color].
awareness.a2.name: Cheerful and Considerate
awareness.a2.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s1][color=#d03052][b][u]Wrathful Thunder[/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=s2][color=#d03052][b][u]Blitz Mine[/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 2.
awareness.a3.name: Innings Change
awareness.a4.name: Past Dreams
awareness.a4.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s3][color=#d03052][b][u]Electroshark[/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=hl][color=#d03052][b][u]Thief Tactics[/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 2.
awareness.a5.name: Extra Run
awareness.a5.description: [b][ref=hl][color=#d03052][b][u]Highlight[/u][/b][/color][/ref] Enhanced[/b]: Increase all foes' [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] taken by [color=#fcff37][b]20%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
awareness.a6.name: Key to Victory
awareness.a6.description: Increase [color=#fcff37][b][i]Shocked[/i][/b][/color] foes' [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage taken[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]20%[/b][/color], and increase [color=#fcff37][b]Electric critical damage taken[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]20%[/b][/color].
